DOC.criteria: Eligibility criterion volunteer whole blood donation base Standards AABB ( 2 ) Code Federal Regualtions 21 CFR 640 ( 3 ) . Specific criterion follow : INCLUSION CRITERIA ( BLOOD , URINE , STOOL AND/OR SPUTUM DONATION ) : Ability sign inform consent . Healthy , male female , 1885 year age . Eligibility criterion volunteer bone marrow donation stringent specimen donation minimize risk procedure complication maximize utility specimen study : Bone Marrow Donation Ability sign inform consent . Healthy , male female , 18 65 year age EXCLUSION CRITERIA ( BLOOD , URINE , STOOL AND/OR SPUTUM DONATION ) : Pregnancy Weight le 110 pound History heart , lung kidney disease , chronic anemia bleed disorder Bone Marrow Donation A known bleeding disorder , low platelet ( less 100k ) take medication interfere blood clotting , aspirin , nonsteroidal antiinflammatory agent warfarin Anemia ( hemoglobin le 12.3 mg/dL ) . Evidence immune deficiency , HIV infection cancer . Pregnancy . Taking medication affect eosinophil , include steroid , betablockers agent affect immune response . Allergic xylocaine . Have take investigational drug last 6 month . Any medical condition investigator feel put participant high risk participation . Warfarin and/or heparin treatment stop subject participate protocol . If warfarin heparin recently discontinue , subject enrol , bone marrow procedure perform PT le 15.5 second PTT within normal range . For agent interfere blood clot without prolong PT , 7 day washout period require bone marrow sampling .
